summary: At the age of ten, Henry James Herman, a boy who was conceived in a petri-dish and raised by his feminist mother, follows a string of Post-It notes in hopes of finding his biological father.

Thomson|Adrienne Merrell
keywords: single mother|biological father|in vitro fertilization|artificial insemination|half brother half sister relationship
title: Jesus Henry Christ
